data.name: DEADCRAFT - It Came From the Junkyard
data.detailed_description:
A new threat approaches!

The tyrant of the Ark has been defeated, but just when it seems like peace had finally returned to the city, a new threat appears.

A hulking behemoth named Revenant arrives with an undead army in tow to try and take over the Ark. It’s up to you to foil his plans and save the city!

Contains all-new missions and an original story featuring a truly fearsome foe.

*This content can only be played after completing the main story.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This content requires the base game DEADCRAFT on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4570 / AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 / Radeon HD7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
